result.arabic_text: يُقَلِّبُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّيۡلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَعِبۡرَةٗ لِّأُوْلِي ٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرِ
result.translation: Imana Allah, Ikurakuranya ijoro n’umurango, Ikanasumbasumbanya imyanya yavyo. Mu vy’ukuri muri ivyo vyose, ni ukuri harimwo inkebuzo yotuma abanyabwenge babushitse babona ubushobozi bw’Imana Allah, maze bakayisenga ari Imwe Rudende.
